backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing access control, user profiles, and full product CRUD with variants, stock, updates, and contact submissions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old product records to the new schema by selecting a single image and adding stock and deletion flags.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, and product/news management.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Documentation explaining how to configure custom domains for the Beemedha Internet Computer deployment.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet importing fonts, defining Tailwind layers, and setting theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing setup using TanStack Router with hash history, including guarded admin and owner dashboard routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard that requires Internet Identity login and admin permissions before rendering children, showing status or denial alerts otherwise.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with error handling and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Reusable brand‑styled layout primitives including Section, Container, Card, Badge, and Button wrappers.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with brand info, social links, quick links, a newsletter form with validation, and dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation links, admin link when authorized, mobile menu, logo, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top‑level site layout composing header, footer, main outlet, background pattern, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Card displaying a product update with type badge, date, title preview, and link to full news entry.
frontend/src/components/products/PriceDi: Price display component showing current price, optional original price, and discount percentage.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product card with image, price, availability badge, variant count, and link to product details.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Disabled add‑to‑cart button with alert indicating checkout is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/products/Variant: Selector for weight or flavor variants that updates selected price and label on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Returns default react‑query live update settings including refetch interval and focus behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document title and meta description based on provided page metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines product, contact form, and other backend data queries and mutations using the actor and react‑query.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with brand story, ethical beekeeping info, and associated visuals.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard providing links to manage products and news, with a notice about admin access. Uses brand cards for navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsPage.t: Allows admins to create, list, and delete product news updates with a dialog form and product selection. Sorts updates by timestamp and displays badges by update type.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Full admin interface for creating, editing, searching, filtering, and deleting products, including handling variants and pricing. Uses dialogs and tables for product management.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Displays certifications, lab testing details, and quality assurance information for the brand.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form page with validation, submission via backend mutation, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, and trust highlights promoting natural honey.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a single news update, including type badge, date, message, and related product info.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Lists product update news with tab filters for update types and shows sorted updates with last-updated info.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Shows the site's privacy policy with structured sections on data collection, use, and security.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information including images, pricing, availability, variants, and related updates.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays products with category filtering using tabs and fetches data via product queries. Renders product cards and shows last updated time.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms & Conditions page with structured sections and metadata. Content includes agreement terms, usage rules, and policy details.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Normalizes asset URLs by encoding filenames to ensure correct rendering of images with special characters.
frontend/src/utils/price.ts: Provides INR price formatting, discount detection, display price logic, and helpers for rendering price information.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing parameters from hash-based URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, architecture notes, and requirements for an e‑commerce site with an admin dashboard.
